Description: THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO SERVE AS A MENTOR ADVISOR TO SENIOR LEADERSHIP TO ENABLE THE DEVELOPMENT AND IMPLEMENTATION OF MISSION AREA SCIENCE INITIATIVES AND ACTIVITIES WITHIN THE CONTEXT OF BROADER DOI AND USGS GOALS AND PRIORITIES.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO ADVISE AND MENTOR STAFF WITHIN THE KANSAS AND CALIFORNIA WATER SCIENCE CENTERS ON THE DESIGN AND DEVELOPMENT OF A NEW LABORATORY INFORMATION MANAGEMENT SYSTEM (LIMS) FOR MEDIUM-SIZED WATER SCIENCE CENTER LABS.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO PERFORM STATISTICAL AND OR TECHNICAL INVESTIGATIONS OF A WIDE VARIETY OF HYDROLOGIC DATA COLLECTED IN THE FIELD AND REVIEW TECHNICAL INTERPRETATIONS PREPARED BY TECHNICIANS AND MAKES CORRECTIONS TO METHODS AND CONCLUSIONS. REVIEWS COLLECTED DATA AND PREPARES A WIDE VARIETY OF COMPLEX MATERIAL FOR PUBLICATION, INCLUDING MAPS, TABLES AND OTHER ILLUSTRATIVE MATERIAL. COMPUTES INDIRECT MEASUREMENTS. PERFORMS GENERAL OFFICE REVIEW AND OR QUALITY-ASSURANCE REVIEW OF IN-HOUSE AND OR CONTRACTOR PERFORMED COMPLEX SURFACE-WATER RECORDS CHECKING METHODS AND ACCURACY OF COMPUTATION, PLOTTING AND INVESTIGATING DIFFERENCES IN HYDROGRAPHS AND MAKING NECESSARY CHANGES TO CORRECT FOR INCONSISTENCIES IN DATA.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO ADVISE AND MENTOR SCIENCE CENTER IT STAFF IN THE DESIGN, TROUBLESHOOTING AND IMPLEMENTATION OF ON-SITE TELECOMMUNICATIONS SOLUTIONS GIVEN THE UNIQUE CIRCUMSTANCES OF FEDERAL SITES INTERACTING WITH THE CONTRACT CARRIER.

FUNDING OPPORTUNITY NUMBER:  G-G-CSS-23-003CFDA 15.072RECIPIENT:NATIONAL EXPERIENCED WORKFORCE SOLUTIONS, INC.PROJECT TITLE:  USGS ESP STARTUP COSTSPROJECT ABSTRACT:PROGRAM STARTUP COSTS TO START AND BEGIN IMPLEMENTING THE USGS ESP PROGRAM. WITHIN 45 DAYS, THE NEW SOLUTIONS USGS ESP TEAM, ALONG WITH USGS STAFF, WILL CONSIDER THE PROGRESS MADE AND REMAINING FUNDS AND TIMELINE.
